name: TextRange
description: Represents the text frame for a shape object.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Represents the plain text content of the text range.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Returns a ShapeFont object that represents the font attributes for the text range.

methods.name: getCharacters
methods.description: Returns a TextRange object for characters in the given range.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Position of the first character in the returned range.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Optional. The number of characters to be returned. If omitted, it represents the number of characters from "start" to the end of the last paragraph in TextRange.
